main_headlines: Navy Blue Rhinestone Bodycon Mini Dress
Be Unforgettable in Navy Blue Sparkle
copy_content.product_description: Dazzling navy blue rhinestone bodycon mini dress with gold crystal accents. Perfect for clubs, parties & special events. Luxuriously soft rhinestone-embellished stretch fabric - timeless elegance meets everyday comfort.

testimonials_sample.name: Emma K.
testimonials_sample.text: obsessed with this dress!! the navy blue with gold rhinestones is literally so stunning. wore it to my birthday and got compliments all night üéâ

testimonials_sample.name: Sophia L.
testimonials_sample.text: the fit is PERFECT. bodycon but not too tight, and the slit is the perfect length. the gold rhinestones catch the light so beautifully ‚ú®

testimonials_sample.name: Olivia R.
testimonials_sample.text: This dress is everything! The navy blue is so much more unique than black and the gold rhinestone pattern is absolutely gorgeous. I wore it to a club for NYE and literally every person asked where I got it. The bodycon fit is so flattering and the square neckline with the spaghetti straps is chef's kiss. The thigh-high slit is the perfect length - sexy but classy. Already planning my next event to wear it again!

social_proof_elements: 32 people viewing this right now (live counter)
WORN BY YOUR FAVORITES: Alix Earle, Monet McMichael, Alex Cooper

critical_gaps.franky_shaw_requirement: Hero gallery with TikTok-style Q&A overlays positioned on images (question top-left, answer bottom-right with ‚úì checkmark)
critical_gaps.current_state: Static product images with no overlays
critical_gaps.impact: HIGH - This is a signature Franky Shaw element that creates social proof and relatability
HIGH - Lime is a core brand color in Franky Shaw design system

critical_gaps.franky_shaw_requirement: Bundle section with lime (#CDFF00) background showing multiple purchase options
critical_gaps.impact: HIGH - Key conversion element for AOV increase

critical_gaps.franky_shaw_requirement: FAQ with lime background (#CDFF00) and Material Design icons
critical_gaps.current_state: FAQ with standard accordion and generic ‚ñº arrows
critical_gaps.impact: MEDIUM - Visual differentiation and brand consistency

critical_gaps.franky_shaw_requirement: FAQs use Material icons (sports_gymnastics, laundry, elderly_woman, pregnant_woman, face_4)
Interactive drag slider with 'THE OLD' vs 'THE NEW' labels, grayscale vs color
critical_gaps.impact: MEDIUM - Strong visual demonstration of product benefits

critical_gaps.franky_shaw_requirement: Dark (#2e2a39) sections alternating with light sections, showing problems (üö´) and solutions (‚úÖ)
critical_gaps.current_state: Mostly light backgrounds with minimal dark sections
critical_gaps.impact: MEDIUM - Visual rhythm and emotional journey

critical_gaps.element: Full Banner Images with Dark Overlays
critical_gaps.franky_shaw_requirement: Full-width hero banners with dark overlay and white text (e.g., 'THE ORIGINAL & MADE IN AMERICA', 'MADE TO MOVE WITH YOU')
critical_gaps.current_state: Standard product images without overlay text
critical_gaps.impact: MEDIUM - Brand storytelling and visual impact

critical_gaps.franky_shaw_requirement: Multiple lifestyle images throughout the page with TikTok Q&A overlays, never covering faces
critical_gaps.current_state: Product images only, no lifestyle shots with overlays
critical_gaps.impact: HIGH - Social proof and aspirational positioning

critical_gaps.franky_shaw_requirement: Personal founder story with emotional tone (e.g., 'Why I Made Waist Mafia')
critical_gaps.impact: LOW - Builds brand connection but not critical for dress

critical_gaps.franky_shaw_requirement: Horizontal 3-step timeline (üõí DAY 1, üì¶ DAY 2, üéÅ DAY 4) with 'Order within the next hour' urgency
30+ sections with strict TEXT ‚Üí IMAGE alternating pattern (3-5 sentences max per text block)
critical_gaps.current_state: ~15 sections with longer text blocks and fewer visual breaks
critical_gaps.impact: HIGH - Mobile scrolling rhythm and engagement

existing_elements_that_match.notes: Has influencer bar with 3 avatars (Alix Earle, Monet McMichael, Alex Cooper) but uses navy gradient instead of light background
20 testimonial images (120x240px UGC style) with full reviews, names, platforms, dates, ratings - matches Franky Shaw approach
Gen Z style order bump with 3 complementary items (+$10), images, value stack, and dual CTA buttons
Multiple trust badges for shipping, returns, security, rating
Size buttons XS-XXL with sold-out states
Live viewer count, stock counter, added today badge - all animated
Has accordion but uses standard icons instead of Material Design icons, and no lime background

payment_flow: Netlify function calls SimpleSwap Pool API (https://simpleswap-automation-1.onrender.com)
User redirected to SimpleSwap checkout with seamless transition overlay

order_bump.value_proposition: Zero malfunctions. Pure confidence. Complete look.

gap_analysis_summary.overall_assessment: Current site is HIGH QUALITY e-commerce landing page with premium design and strong conversion elements, but MISSING signature Franky Shaw visual identity and mobile-first structure.
gap_analysis_summary.conversion_strength: STRONG - Has social proof, urgency, trust badges, order bump, dual CTAs, testimonials with images
gap_analysis_summary.visual_identity_gap: MAJOR - Lacks Franky Shaw's lime color palette, TikTok overlay aesthetic, and dark/light section alternation
gap_analysis_summary.mobile_optimization_gap: MODERATE - Has responsive design but lacks the strict TEXT‚ÜíIMAGE rhythm and 30+ section structure
gap_analysis_summary.franky_shaw_compatibility: 60% - Good foundation but needs significant visual transformation
quick_wins: Add TikTok Q&A overlays to hero gallery images
Create bundle section with lime background
Transform FAQ to lime background with Material icons
Add lifestyle images with TikTok overlays throughout
major_transformations_needed: Restructure to 30+ sections with TEXT‚ÜíIMAGE alternation
Add full-width banner images with dark overlays and white text
Create problem/solution journey with emoji bullets (üö´ and ‚úÖ)
Add multiple lifestyle images breaking up text sections
Implement lime as primary accent color throughout
Add founder/story sections with personal tone

phase_1_visual_identity: Update announcement bar background to lime (#CDFF00)
Add TikTok overlay components to hero image gallery
Create lime background bundle section (3 options: single, bundle deal, super bundle)
Transform FAQ section: lime background + Material icons (sports_gymnastics, laundry, elderly_woman, etc.)
Update influencer bar to light background (#f8f8f8) per Franky Shaw spec
phase_2_content_expansion: Create dark background (#2e2a39) problem section with üö´ bullets
Create light background solution section with ‚úÖ bullets
Add 3-5 lifestyle images with TikTok Q&A overlays
Add full-width banner sections with overlay text
phase_3_structure_optimization: Break existing content into 30+ smaller sections
Implement strict TEXT (3-5 sentences) ‚Üí IMAGE pattern
Add visual delivery timeline (3-step with emojis)
Add more visual breaks between text blocks
Implement smooth scroll rhythm for mobile
phase_4_interactive_elements: Implement interactive comparison slider (drag to reveal)
Add animated Material Design icons to FAQ
Add premium hover effects on lifestyle images
Implement TikTok overlay animations on scroll

performance_optimizations: Responsive images with srcset (avif, webp, jpg)

final_assessment.current_quality: HIGH - Premium e-commerce landing page with strong conversion elements
final_assessment.franky_shaw_alignment: 60% - Good foundation but needs visual identity transformation
final_assessment.estimated_transformation_effort: MODERATE - 40% of code needs updates, 60% can be preserved
final_assessment.recommendation: Transform to Franky Shaw while preserving existing testimonials, order bump, and premium interactions. Focus on visual identity (lime, TikTok overlays, section structure) rather than rebuilding from scratch.
